text: The Siwanoy were a tribe of Native Americans who lived mostly in The Bronx and Westchester County, New York. They were part of a group of tribes called the Wappinger-Mattabesec Confederacy. Today, the descendants of the Siwanoy people live all across the United States. == References == Category:Native Americans Category:Ethnic groups in the United States
title: Siwanoy
